title: Anaphora3290
author: Anaphora3290
created_time: June 20, 2023, 04:22:45 PMLast edit: June 21, 2023, 02:19:27 AM by Anaphora3290
content: Decentralizing and Democratizing Artificial Intelligence with AIaaS (artificial intelligence-as-a-service)Anaphora AI is a Decentralized Artificial Intelligence platform and marketplace that offers AIaaS (Artificial Intelligence-as-a-Service) solutions powered by blockchain technology. Anaphora AI is democratizing AI solutions and services and making them more accessible for businesses and consumers alike. AI solutions developers can list and sell their AI solutions in our marketplace. ANAPH token is an ERC-20 token. It's an AI utility token we created for the Anaphora AI ecosystem.HOW IT WORKSCompanies, organizations and consumers can use AI services from various providers and only pay for what they use. AI service providers will have access to a large and diverse marketplace that allows them to monetize their AI products and services. AI service/solution providers will be able to list their products and services for buyers to bid on. Buyers will also be able to list project requests and specifications for services or solutions they need that AI developers can bid on. ANAPH token will be used as payment.Website: www.Anaphora.aiLink to all of our social media and whitepaper: https://linktr.ee/AnaphoraAI
